titleStmt.title: A short history of the succession of the Kings and Queens of England, from William the Conqueror, to His present Majesty King William, the III. to the imperial crowns of these realms of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland; is briefly illustrated and declared.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Croom, over against Bridewell near Fleet-bridge, and sold by R. Baldwin,

notesStmt.note: First line of text: William the Con-.
Year of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
